to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: The driver hastens next handlebar grandpa uprear, apologize again and again.
sentences.chinese: 司机赶忙下车把老大爷扶起，并连连道歉。

sentences.english: The horse snorted  and shied at the train.
sentences.chinese: 那匹马被火车吓得直喷鼻连连倒退。

sentences.english: Yawn publicly with an open mouth, indicating boredom.
sentences.chinese: 在公共场所，张大嘴巴连连打呵欠，显示你极度厌倦。

sentences.english: BDBD hedge anger snarls Han Jinquan Han Jinquan can only apology.
sentences.chinese: 魏东篱气得怒骂韩金铨，韩金铨只能连连道歉。

sentences.english: Some staff members grumbling about the new sick-leave policy.
sentences.chinese: 一些员工对于新的病假制度抱怨连连。

sentences.english: I'd rather grasp my fate now than complain about everything later.
sentences.chinese: 与其事后抱怨连连，不如趁现在把握命运。

sentences.english: In some parts of the world, winter brings not just a season of snow but very dangerous blizzards .
sentences.chinese: 有些地区在冬季不仅雪花片片，而是风雪连连。

sentences.english: Lai I repeatedly promise, want to see the play.
sentences.chinese: 赖爷连连答应，要看鹬蚌相争。

sentences.english: The judge was enraged and stroke the table for several times.
sentences.chinese: 大法官被气得连连拍案。

sentences.english: The white works properly to repeatedly nod, evil very ferocious, clearly didn't see all know.
sentences.chinese: 白灵连连点头，邪好厉害，明明没有看见都知道。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Persian army had just suffered from a previous defeat and some inner conflicts and divisions.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，刚吃过一场败仗的波斯军队却内讧连连。

sentences.english: After Zhao implemented the reform, the army's fighting capacity was strengthened and won battles one after the other.
sentences.chinese: 赵国实行改革后，军队的战斗力加强了，连连打胜仗。

sentences.english: Ginny's mom sighed and figured the bill hadn't been paid.
sentences.chinese: 金妮的妈妈叹气连连，猜想肯定是电话费没交。

sentences.english: Alarm, the guards down to the ground, again and again a misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 惊恐之下，卫兵扑倒在地，连连请罪。

sentences.english: Wounds from a friend can be trusted, but an enemy multiplies kisses.
sentences.chinese: 朋友加的伤痕，出于忠诚，仇敌连连亲嘴，却是多馀。

sentences.english: Everybody needs a dream catcher, someone to be there when the bad dreams are all you can see…
sentences.chinese: 人人需要捕梦网，当你仅看到噩梦连连有人在那儿。

definition: helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]

grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
